extraData: TARGET feywild:spring_pixie ACTION use TIMES 2 USING minecraft:honeycomb
name: Honey Combs
text: Oh bravest of gullible wizards, I require your aid! /nJust now I was stealing some yummy honey from the Summer Courts Yard. /nI got caught by one of the Bee Knights patrolling the area /nand he stole my g&honey! /nYou have to steal it back for me,/nand make those evil Knights pay for their crimes! /nWhat you won't do it? /nYou just have to, or...we won't be friends anymore!
